plot outline: Dr. Raghav Shastri, Indian by origin, is NASA's youngest scientist. He returns to his motherland, only to find out that his country is full of god worshippers. However, Raghav is not one of them. He challenges the existence of god and orders the locality to shut the temple within the premises. But in a twist of fate, god himself descends and questions the atheist. Will Raghav finally believe in god?
title: Deool Band
plot: Dr. Raghav Shastri, Indian by origin, is NASA's youngest scientist. He returns to his motherland, only to find out that his country is full of god worshippers. However, Raghav is not one of them. He challenges the existence of god and orders the locality to shut the temple within the premises. But in a twist of fate, god himself descends and questions the atheist. Will Raghav finally believe in god?

Dr Raghav Shastri is a young NASA scientist with a bad ego thou off Indian origin he hates India and its people.Raghav arrives in the country to work on major project headed by Dr Vyas.Raghav has to prepare a frequency which will prevent terrorist attacks from sea. Intelligence get information that terrorist Rashida and Hafeez followed him to the country and want to kill him.Raghav 's flight is landed in Pune instead of Mumbai,Raghav and his family is made to live in a Housing Society instead of a lavish hotel all this measures are taken considering his security.Narayni a lady officer is given the in charge of his security. The Housing Society where Raghav stays has a temple of Swami Samrath and people out there are very religious and conduct prayers early in the mornings and also in evenings s by playing instruments which creates lots of noise due to this Raghav is not able to concentrate on his project.Raghav being a Atheist ask s the Society Manager to stop all this.Few days go and there is silence in the society and Raghav is able to complete his project but the time he completes his project,Raghav again hears the same sounds again people praying loudly with musical instruments due to a festive occasion this irks him and goes down to stop everything that's happening but gets in scuffle with a devotee Shiva.Raghav calls Dr Vyas and tells that his project is complete but before handling it he has to close the temple in Society Premises forever things happen as per Raghav when he reaches is room he finds that his kid daughter has put unknown password for his project and locked it.Here on Raghav's difficulties start. As the temple gets close Raghav starts seeing Swami Samarth who follows him everywhere and also tries to help him in his difficult phase.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com
